UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Understanding the importance of glycosylated threonine and stereospecific action of Drosocin, a Proline rich antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Lele DS, Talat S, Kumari S, Srivastava N, Kaur KJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.4±0.2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=0.6±0.1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=0.2±0.1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=2.0±0.4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi Vi+(MIC=3.0±0.1µM)
